name: Deploy Agents

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v3
    
    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: '18'
        cache: 'npm'
        
    - name: Install dependencies
      run: |
        npm install -g th-cli
        npm ci
      
    - name: Detect and deploy agents
      run: |
        echo "Deploying all agents..."
        th deploy
        
    - name: Notify deployment status
      if: always()
      run: |
        if [ ${{ job.status }} == 'success' ]; then
          echo "All agents deployed successfully"
        else
          echo "Some agents failed to deploy"
          exit 1
        fi
